description:
The BrainPOP® Featured Movie app is your go-to resource for timely and calendar-aligned digital content. Rotating daily, it covers a range of relevant topics including current events, historical figures and milestones, holidays, and much more.  Make it a part of your students’ days, your kids’ days – and yours! 

BrainPOP brings learning to your fingertips™.

About BrainPOP
BrainPOP® (www.brainpop.com) creates animated, curriculum-based content that engages students, supports teachers, and bolsters achievement - in classrooms, at home, and on mobile devices. Our proven and award-winning educational resources, uniquely suited for 21st century learning, include BrainPOP Jr. (K-3), BrainPOP, BrainPOP Español, and BrainPOP ESL. All are supported by BrainPOP Educators, an online professional community more than 135,000 teachers strong and featuring over 850 free resources. Aligned to academic standards and easy to use, BrainPOP sites host more than 11 million visits each month.
